description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国学者、政治人物，中国共产党党员。
description.en: A Chinese scholar, politician, and member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国省级行政区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所高等院校。
description.en: An institution of higher education located in Beijing, China.

description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China at Beijing Institute of Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的第十三届会议。
description.en: The 13th session of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所高等院校。
description.en: An institution of higher education located in Beijing, China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党北京航空航天大学委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党北京航空航天大学委员会
en: Communist Party of China Committee of Beihang University

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在北京航空航天大学的领导机构。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China at Beihang University.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任北京航空航天大学党委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who previously served as the Party Secretary of Beihang University.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任北京理工大学党委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who previously served as the Party Secretary of Beijing Institute of Technology.

nodes.id: 张军 (航空交通工程技术专家)

zh-cn: 张军 (航空交通工程技术专家)

description.zh-cn: 中国航空交通工程技术专家，北京理工大学党委书记。
description.en: A Chinese expert in air traffic engineering technology and the Party Secretary of Beijing Institute of Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 赵长禄是辽宁人。
description.en: Zhao Changlu is from Liaoning.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，赵长禄是北京理工大学的校友。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Zhao Changlu is an alumnus of Beijing Institute of Technology.

description.zh-cn: 赵长禄曾任教于北京理工大学机械与车辆学院能源与动力工程系。
description.en: Zhao Changlu once taught at the Department of Energy and Power Engineering, School of Mechanical Engineering, Beijing Institute of Technology.

relationships.target: 中国共产党北京理工大学委员会

description.zh-cn: 2016年5月至2022年4月，赵长禄担任北京理工大学党委书记。
description.en: From May 2016 to April 2022, Zhao Changlu served as the Party Secretary of Beijing Institute of Technology.

relationships.target: 中国共产党北京航空航天大学委员会

description.zh-cn: 2022年4月，赵长禄调任北京航空航天大学党委书记。
description.en: In April 2022, Zhao Changlu was transferred to serve as the Party Secretary of Beihang University.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十三届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 赵长禄是第十三届全国政协委员。
description.en: Zhao Changlu is a member of the 13th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 2022年4月，赵长禄接替曹淑敏担任北京航空航天大学党委书记。
description.en: In April 2022, Zhao Changlu succeeded Cao Shumin as the Party Secretary of Beihang University.

description.zh-cn: 2016年5月，赵长禄接替张炜担任北京理工大学党委书记。
description.en: In May 2016, Zhao Changlu succeeded Zhang Wei as the Party Secretary of Beijing Institute of Technology.

relationships.target: 张军 (航空交通工程技术专家)

description.zh-cn: 2022年4月，张军接替赵长禄担任北京理工大学党委书记。
description.en: In April 2022, Zhang Jun succeeded Zhao Changlu as the Party Secretary of Beijing Institute of Technology.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，赵长禄是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Zhao Changlu is a member of the Communist Party of China.
